listing_company_name: Davey Real Estate  - North Beach | Padbury | Scarborough
description:
Ready to gain a dazzling backdrop to your life? Welcome home to Bluewater Apartments.
A resort style living experience, including sauna, gym and solar heated swimming pool all just minutes from the crystal-clear waters of Scarborough Beach.

Designed by experienced developer and builder Gary Dempsey as well as architects Zuideveld Marchant Hur. This 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment is made for modern, relaxed living and blurring the lines between indoors and out. Be spoilt further with two car bays - this may come in handy, as living this close to everything may see you simply, leave the car at home.

Featuring high-spec finishes including stone bench tops, quality integrated kitchen appliances, ducted reverse cycle air-conditioning, wooden floorboards and two entertaining balconies...yes, two!

The luxury of this apartment is defined by no neighbouring walls to your right & a set back balcony to allow exclusive entertaining all year round.

Special Features:
- Intercom system and CCTV security
- Air-conditioning
- LED lighting
- 2.7m high ceilings
- Communal Solar heated swimming pool and sauna
- Communal Fully equipped gymnasium
- Solar Panel System makes communal power cost neutral
- Five Star Energy Rating
- Winner of 2015 MBA award for best built apartment building in WA

Other features include;
- Master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite
- Walk in robe has built in cabinetry
- Quality ensuite with high standard finishes including stone benchtops to the vanity
- Second bedroom with built in robe and cabinetry
- Stunning kitchen with stone benchtops overlooking living area and across to the ocean
- Kitchen appliances including dishwasher, built in microwave and plenty of cupboards and storage space
- Open living area with light filled windows looking out to the ocean
- Two separate balconies for outside entertaining, one on the western/beach side to take in the daily sunsets, the other balcony overlooks the east to take in the morning sun
- 2 secure car bays
- Store room
- Double glazed windows for complete privacy and serenity

Location Features:
- Overlooking the iconic Scarborough Beach
- Walk to the beach - the sand, sun and surf at your doorstep
- Close to cafes and restaurants
- Close to prestigious schools
- Close to parks and reserves

Strata Admin: $1,944.50 p/q (approx.)
Strata Reserve: $187.00 p/q (approx.)

NOTE: This property is/will remain tenanted until November 2023.

For further information contact Lauren Robinson 0406 894 446b or laurenr@daveyrealestate.com.au

Disclaimer - Whilst every care has been taken in the preparation of this advertisement, all information supplied by the seller and the seller's agent is provided in good faith. Prospective purchasers are encouraged to make their own enquiries to satisfy themselves on all pertinent matters.
